title: Macintosh Rom Images
description:
These files are Apple's Macintosh ROM images that can be used with emulators to run the classic Mac OS Operating Systems.

These images are from old computers no longer supported by Apple and hence, they can be considered abandonware.

Abandonware is a product ignored by its owner and manufacturer, and for which no product support is available. Although such product is usually still under copyright, the owner may not be tracking or enforcing copyright violations. Abandonware is a variant of the general concept of orphan works.

As far as we know, Apple never released any official statements in regards to their legacy Mac ROMs and never took legal action to enforce it's copy.

In this torrent you will find the following ROM images separated by size:

64KB ROMs

28BA61CE - Macintosh 128
28BA4E50 - Macintosh 512K

128KB ROMs

4D1EEEE1 - MacPlus v1
4D1EEAE1 - MacPlus v2
4D1F8172 - MacPlus v3

256KB ROMs
97221136 - Mac II FDHD & IIx & IIcx
96645F9C - PowerBook 100
96CA3846 - Mac Portable
B306E171 - Mac SE FDHD

512KB ROMs

350EACF0 - Mac LC
